\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* art \w thou|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*? \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \add thou shalt become \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*: \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* stone \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w shoutings|strong="H8663"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Grace|strong="H2580"\w*, \w grace|strong="H2580"\w*, \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,
